display_on_card.label: Display on card
display_on_card.info: Adjacent product blocks set to display on card will merge into a single card. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/display-product-blocks-on-cards.html)

repeat_text.label: Repeat text
repeat_text.info: Automatically repeat text to create an infinity effect.

image_shape.label: Image shape
image_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

video_shape.label: Video shape
video_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the video. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-videos-with-shapes.html)

sticker_font_size.label: Font size
sticker_font_size.info: Font size is relative to sticker width.

first_large_image_position.label: First large image position on desktop

only_show_button_on_hover.label: Only show buttons on hover on desktop

first_large_image_position_on_desktop.label: First large image position on desktop

only_show_buttons_on_hover_on_desktop.label: Only show buttons on hover on desktop

settings.paragraph_if_a_user: If a user has reduced motion enabled the marquee will not animate and display as a static banner as a fallback.

apply_effects.label: Apply heading effects
apply_effects.info: Only applies if heading font is selected. Heading effects can be customised in theme settings.

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick buy
enable_quick_buy.info: If a product only has two variants buttons will be shown. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/show-quick-buy.html)

settings.paragraph_these_settings_only: These settings only apply when layout is set to grid.
settings.these_settings_only_apply_when_layout_is: These settings only apply when layout is set to carousel.

thumbnail_shape.label: Shape
thumbnail_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

settings.paragraph_customers_who_subscribe: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the “accepts marketing” [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

display_content_below_image_on_mobile.label: Display content below image on mobile

display_text_overlay_on_a_card.label: Display text overlay on a card

linklist.label: Collection menu
linklist.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

collection_menu.label: Collection menu
collection_menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

default_image_shape.label: Default image shape
default_image_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

settings.these_settings_only_apply_when_layout_is: These settings only apply when layout is set to grid.

shape.label: Shape
shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

settings.customers_who_subscribe_will_have_their_: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the “accepts marketing” [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).
settings.paragraph_adjust_the_number: Adjust the number of items, zoom level and rotation to achieve the desired effect.
settings.adjust_the_number_of_items_zoom_level_an: Adjust the number of items, zoom level and rotation to achieve the desired effect.
settings.if_a_user_has_reduced_motion_enabled_the: If a user has reduced motion enabled the marquee will not animate and display as a static banner as a fallback.

apply_heading_effects.label: Apply heading effects
apply_heading_effects.info: Only applies if heading font is selected. Heading effects can be customised in theme settings.

blob_type.label: Blob type
blob_type.info: Applies when blob shape is selected.

font_size.label: Font size
font_size.info: Font size is relative to sticker width.

mute_video.label: Mute
mute_video.info: If autoplay is enabled above, video will be muted and this setting will have no effect

enable_parallax.label: Enable parallax
enable_parallax.info: When enabled pattern will scroll slower than the rest of the page.

blob_type.label: Blob type
blob_type.info: Applies when blob shape is selected above.

enable_parallax.label: Enable parallax
enable_parallax.info: When enabled shape will scroll slower than the rest of the page.

show_price.label: Show price in add to cart button

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

page.label: Page
page.info: Contact form fields will not be displayed in the pop up.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

information.label: Information
information.info: Separate label and value with a comma. Use line breaks to add a new row. Use a hyphen to indent rows. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/nutritional-information.html)

value_alt.label: Dynamic value
value_alt.info: Override setting above with dynamic sources. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/add-bar-charts.html#add-dynamic-sources-to-bar-charts)

marker_position_alt.label: Dynamic marker position
marker_position_alt.info: Override setting above with dynamic sources. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/add-comparative-scales.html#add-dynamic-sources-to-comparative-scales)

settings.paragraph_to_select_complementary: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

target_section.label: Target section
target_section.info: This will be the section that connects to the straight side of the divider. Best to use sections with a solid background color. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/style-blocks/shape-divider.html)

target_section_color_scheme.label: Target section color scheme
target_section_color_scheme.info: Select the color scheme of the target section

enable_animation.label: Enable animation
enable_animation.info: Asymmetrical shape dividers will sway when animated.

settings.paragraph_using_an_image: Using an image will override shape and text settings above.

rotate_only_when_page_is_scrolling.label: Rotate only when page is scrolling

enable_parallax.label: Enable parallax
enable_parallax.info: When enabled stickers will scroll faster than the rest of the page.

settings.paragraph_used_for_section: Used for section titles and main section headings
settings.paragraph_used_for_product: Used for product, collection, article and page templates
settings.paragraph_used_for_blog: Used for blog post grid, text columns and other secondary headings

button_border_width.label: Width
button_border_width.info: Set to 0 to show no border

button_show_border_on_shadow.label: Show border on shadow
button_show_border_on_shadow.info: Border color and width will use border settings above.

sticker_border_width.label: Width
sticker_border_width.info: Set to 0 to show no border

sticker_show_border_on_shadow.label: Show border on shadow
sticker_show_border_on_shadow.info: Border color and width will use border settings above.

card_border_width.label: Width
card_border_width.info: Set to 0 to show no border

card_show_border_on_shadow.label: Show border on shadow
card_show_border_on_shadow.info: Border color and width will use border settings above.

settings.paragraph_set_up_default: Set up default media style for images and video. Media styles can be further extended or removed in specific sections.

media_border_width.label: Width
media_border_width.info: Set to 0 to show no border

settings.paragraph_shadow_will_not: Shadow will not display if media is inside a card.

media_shadow_color.label: Color
media_shadow_color.info: Gradient will fallback to border color if shadow style is set to border.

media_show_border_on_shadow.label: Show border on shadow
media_show_border_on_shadow.info: Border color and width will use border settings above.

icon_thickness.label: Thickness
icon_thickness.info: Applies to all icons except social icons.

product_tile_media_shape.label: Image shape
product_tile_media_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

show_on_sale_and_sold_out_badges.label: Show on sale and sold out badges

product_tile_metafield_badge.label: Metafield key
product_tile_metafield_badge.info: Add metafield key with the namespace shapes_theme. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/show-custom-badges.html)

parallax_intensity.label: Parallax intensity
parallax_intensity.info: Adjust the level of parallax animations. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/)

settings.paragraph_cart_and_checkout: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_accelerated_checkout.label: Enable accelerated checkout buttons
enable_accelerated_checkout.info: Disable this if you’d like the buttons to appear on your checkout page. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/accelerated-checkouts)

open_modal_on_add_to_cart.label: Open modal when product is added to cart
open_modal_on_add_to_cart.info: Add to cart behaviour when cart type is set to modal

custom_cursor.label: Custom cursor
custom_cursor.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph_x_and_y: X and Y coordinates indicating the cursor hotspot; the precise position within the cursor that is being pointed to.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

redirect_link.label: Link
redirect_link.info: Visitors will be redirected to this link if they click the deny button or enter a date of birth that is under the required age.

column_1_image.label: Image
column_1_image.info: Replace column title with an image.

column_2_image.label: Image
column_2_image.info: Replace column title with an image.

column_3_image.label: Image
column_3_image.info: Replace column title with an image.

column_4_image.label: Image
column_4_image.info: Replace column title with an image.

custom_liquid.label: Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

apply_effects.label: Apply heading effects
apply_effects.info: Heading effects can be customised in theme settings.

image_shape.label: Image shape
image_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop images. Does not apply to videos or models. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

settings.paragraph_to_display_your: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

linklist_1.label: Menu 1
linklist_1.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

linklist_2.label: Menu 2
linklist_2.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

show_all_navigation_links.label: Enable links to drop-down link headings

showcase_second_level_links.label: Showcase second-level links
showcase_second_level_links.info: Second-level links to products or collections will be showcased if they don't have any child links. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co)

showcase_first_level_collections.label: Showcase first-level collections
showcase_first_level_collections.info: First-level links to collections with no child links will showcase products in a dropdown. Does not apply to drawer navigation. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/feature-collections-in-navigation.html)

show_collection_images.label: Show collection images
show_collection_images.info: Does not apply to drawer navigation.

overlay_show_separator_border.label: Show separator border
overlay_show_separator_border.info: Requires Show border between sections to be enabled in layout settings.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: When overlay header is enabled background color will be transparent.

auto_rotate.label: Auto-rotate slides
auto_rotate.info: This will show a play and pause button and disable dragging.

crop_desktop.label: Aspect ratio – desktop
crop_desktop.info: Desktop aspect ratio only applies if this is the first slide and the section’s height is set to “Adapt to first slide,” otherwise the slide will adapt to the slideshow’s height

fallback_image.label: Fallback image
fallback_image.info: Shown if video fails to load or play

crop_desktop.label: Aspect ratio – desktop
crop_desktop.info: Desktop aspect ratio only applies if this is the first slide and the section’s height is set to “Adapt to first slide,” otherwise the slide will adapt to the slideshow’s height

crop.label: Image crop
crop.info: Recommended to keep consistent image size across slides.

disable_media_style.label: Disable media style
disable_media_style.info: Recommended if using images with a transparent background.

intro_paragraph.content: For more options, including the ability to put videos inside shapes, consider using a Shopify-hosted video and the Video with text section [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/sections/content/video-with-text)

chromeless.label: Ask to declutter
chromeless.info: We will request an embed with fewer interface elements. It is up to the video provider to honor this request. For full control over the elements visible in the video, consider using a Shopify-hosted video and the Video with text section [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/sections/content/video-with-text)

show_next_previous_links.label: Show links to next / previous articles

settings.paragraph_use_this_block: Use this block instead of the collection banner section if you would like to use a continuous pattern for the whole template.

newsletter_form_heading.label: Newsletter form heading
newsletter_form_heading.info: [Tell your visitors about a launch day discount](https://www.shopify.com/blog/15514000-14-ways-to-use-offers-coupons-discounts-and-deals-to-drive-revenue-and-customer-loyalty).

image_shape.label: Image shape
image_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop images. Does not apply to videos or models. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/)

image_shape.label: Image shape
image_shape.info: Selecting some shapes will crop the image. [Learn more](https://docs.switchthemes.co/shapes/guides/style-images-with-shapes.html)

show_product_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_product_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

disable_media_style.label: Disable media style
disable_media_style.info: Recommended if using brand logos for testimonials

show_index_on_blocks.label: Display index on blocks
show_index_on_blocks.info: Shows a number on each block, great for "how it works" sections that involve steps.

settings.paragraph_if_set_will: If set, will be used instead of the YouTube video option. Offers improved performance.

fallback_image.label: Fallback image for YouTube video
fallback_image.info: Shown if YouTube video fails to load or play

settings.paragraph_natural_will_use: “Natural” will use the video’s intrinsic aspect ratio for uploaded videos or 16:9 for YouTube videos

video.label: Video
video.info: If set, will be used instead of the embedded video option. Offers improved performance.
